::Grounded::
Grounded finally got his roots to his max of 200 m and moved to there
spourtiing up a few m behind Wildrider....he trnasformed and looked at
Wildrider and then looked down and stuck his finger into the ground
three more times....This time up grew a yellow rose a mushroom and
white rose....The white rose began to send false signals jsut in case
Wildrider tied to communicate or had sensors on him....The yellow rose
started to vibrate and make emit large soundwaves possibly screwing up
a bots balance or extremely hurting the hearing sensors....finally the
mushroom sprayed a white mist that would disable eye optics....As
these were put out two opticcovers slid over Grounded's eyes and two
more hearing cover slid over his sound inputs..He opened a comm link
to his new friend Windlord...."Stay a safe distance....i have quite a
storm brewing hear and you don't have your rain gear" he commanded as
the mixture of his mists swirled together and spread throught the sky....
